scripts.export: cp next.config.js.prod next.config.js && next build && next export
scripts.export-win: copy next.config.js.prod next.config.js && next build && next export
scripts.post-update: echo "codesandbox preview only, need an update" && yarn upgrade --latest
scripts.generate: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export
scripts.deploy: touch out/.nojekyll && git add -f out && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages && cp next.config.js.dev next.config.js
scripts.deploy-win: fsutil file createnew out/.nojekyll 0 && git add -f out && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages && copy next.config.js.dev next.config.js
